query:
UPDATE agent_tasks SET
                        status = 'completed',
                        updated_at = $1,
                        completed_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
                        started_at = COALESCE(started_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP),
                        execution_time_ms = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - COALESCE(started_at, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) * 1000
                    WHERE task_id = $2
